Name: Start service
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: A call from the user to the administrator indicating that the user would like to have a new account added. Information user passes as input includes : her first, middle and last name, her address, IP address of the Phone she would like to have activated, the new phone number she would like to have for the new IP Phone and the phone number of a temporary phone where she can be reached for feedback. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator adds new account to system

Name: Suspend/resume service
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to suspend or resume certain accounts due to bill payment issues. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator suspends or resumes certain accounts

Name: Cancel Service
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to cancel a service either because user has skipped too many bills or user does not use the particular account anymore (probably due to the user not using the account�s phone anymore) System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator cancels a service in the system.

Name: Update service
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4 Event: System administrator decides to modify certain attributes of a particular user service/account, the attributes including everything but the �status� field (the changes of which is covered in UC1, UC2, UC3. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator performs updates on a particular user account.

Name: Add a user
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: While administrator is trying to start a service (create an account) for a user, administrator finds that the user does not exist in the system altogether (i.e., user has no account on system), administrator needs to add user to system before being able to add service(s) for that user. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator adds a new user to the system.

Name: Deactivate a user
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: For reasons such as not paying bills or abusing the service, system administrator decides to deactivate a certain user in the system System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator performs various administrative functions on the IP Phone System.

Name: Add/remove billing plan
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to add or remove a billing plan to or from the system. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator adds or removes a billing plan to or from the system.

Name: View bills
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to view a bill of an account of a particular user. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator views a bill.

Name: Modify bills
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to modify a bill of a particular user. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator modifies a bill.

Name: Print bills
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: Administrator decides to print a bill of a particular user. System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator prints a bill.

Name: Maintenance test
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4, Yuan Peng Event: System: Server Actors: System Administrator Overview: Description of internal behaviour while system administrator performs maintenance tests on the IP Phone System.

Name: Make a call
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4 Event: A user of the IP Phone System attempts to make a telephone communication with another user of the IP Phone System System: IP Phone System Actors: Users of IP phones Overview: Description of internal behaviour while user makes calls over the IP Phone System

Name: Receive a call
Authors: M3, M2, M1, M4 Event: A user of the IP Phone System notices that the ringer of her phone has gone off, she proceeds to pick up the phone and attempts to conduct a normal conversation with the initiating party at the other end. System: Server Actors: User of IP Phone System Overview: Description of internal behaviour before, during, and after user receives a call on the IP Phone System

Name: Clock Authors: Yuan Peng Event: This use case is initiated when the system starts running. System: ClockTick Actors: External clock Overview: The clock on the server machine is external to the system. It sends time updates to the system and the system carries out time-related tasks, e.g., phone status checks and automated billing.
